metadata.title: CVE-2024-38614 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:openrisc: traps: Don't send signals to kernel mode threads OpenRISCexception handling sends signals to user processes on floating pointexceptions and trap instructions (for debugging) among others. There is abug where the trap handling logic may send signals to kernel threads, weshould not send these signals to kernel threads, if that happens we treatit as an error. This patch adds conditions to die if the kernel receivesthese exceptions in kernel mode code.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
